channel.title: Wonders - by Andrew Young
channel.description:
This is my first new track made with Auxy in a long time. I decided to make the drum beats not too complicated.
https://soundcloud.com/user-324781623/wonders

item.title: Wonders - by Andrew Young
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Try to make all of your melodies work together more. It seems like a jumbled mess of melodies in the beginning( I tried to say this in the least offensive way possible). The drums are pretty good though. You should maybe add a pad running in the background to keep it less empty.

Read full topic
